case.title: Sincerely looking to meet a great guy - 58 (staten Island, NY)
case.text:
You may be same age/ younger/intelligent, love your life, attractive, sincere and "really" wish to meet.
Please do not be married/involved/ or a smoker
You should be employed/or retired!
I'm attractive, 5'6, 157 green eyes, short auburn hair.............Smart, funny and love my life.... would be nice
to enjoy the rest of the summer with a "great" guy..................... ..let's chat, ..let's meet..
I will only reply to responses with a picture...........I know you're out there...........Don't be shy....I'm not!.
I am sincere and I really wish to meet and see if this internet dating can actually work
